description:
Export video feature is pretty simple with our web app. Please follow the steps below : 

  1. Open "My Videos" Page
  2. Select the desired video to open the player page
  3. Find Export... options at the bottom of the right sidebar
  4. Select Facebook option
  5. Your video should be exported (Authentication is required, if you are not connected to Facebook, or upload permission is not provided)

Please go through this video for a walkthrough of the export feature:

PS: Export to Youtube, and other services are also available.


Want to try exporting now ? Visit the My Videos page.
description_text:
Export video feature is pretty simple with our web app. Please follow the steps below :  
 
 
 Open "My Videos" Page 
 Select the desired video to open the player page 
 Find Export... options at the bottom of the right sidebar 
 Select Facebook option 
 Your video should be exported (Authentication is required, if you are not connected to Facebook, or upload permission is not provided) 
 
   
 Please go through this video for a walkthrough of the export feature: 
   
 
 
 
   
 
PS: Export to Youtube, and other services are also available. 
 
   
 Want to try exporting now ? Visit the My Videos page.
title: How to export video to Facebook
